name: nzbfox
title: nzbFox
description: Adds the ability to control & send NZB files directly to remote download clients
author: Enesce

preferences.name: dl_finish_notifications
preferences.title: Download Finished Notification
preferences.description: Notification is shown when a download has finished. Attached to the nzbFox toolbar icon

preferences.name: dl_start_notifications
preferences.title: Download Started Notification
preferences.description: Notification is shown when a download is started. Attached to the nzbFox toolbar icon

preferences.name: dl_notification_type
preferences.title: Download Notification Type
preferences.description:
Standard notifications will only be visible while your browser window is active.
Desktop notifications will appear even when your browser is in the background

preferences.name: sab_apikey
preferences.title: SABnzbd+ API Key
preferences.description: Found under Config -> General -> API Key

preferences.name: cat_custom
preferences.title: Extra Categories
preferences.description: Comma separated list of extra categories to add to NZB download prompt category list

preferences.name: dev
preferences.title: Developer Mode
preferences.description:
Enables additional logging to web console.
Only enable if you know what you are doing!

preferences.name: connection_timeout
preferences.title: Connection Timeout
preferences.description:
Seconds. Time to wait for remote download client to respond to API calls. Default 1 second
Must be lower than active refresh speed.

preferences.name: refresh_active
preferences.title: Refresh Speed while Active
preferences.description: Seconds. While the UI Panel is visible or an NZB is downloading, nzbFox will refresh your download client at this speed. Default 3 seconds, 0 to disable

preferences.name: refresh_idle
preferences.title: Refresh Speed while Idle
preferences.description: Seconds. While the UI Panel is hidden and an NZB is not downloading, nzbFox will refresh your download client at this speed. Default 2 minutes, 0 to disable

preferences.name: refresh_history
preferences.title: Refresh History Speed
preferences.description: Seconds. How often to check remote history for finished downloads. Default 15 seconds

preferences.name: custom_indexers
preferences.title: Personal Newznab Indexers
preferences.description:
If you have your own Newznab indexer, enter the domain name here.
Default template is recommended.
Use ',' for multiple domains.
(Example: myindexer.com,192.168.1.4,localhost)

preferences.name: prompt_action
preferences.title: Automatically Send NZB Downloads to
preferences.description: When prompted to download an NZB file, select an option here if you want nzbFox to automatically send the NZB to your download client
